IndustriesSection.saasInnovationStartupsDesc: Campaigns that raise awareness and build trust around ideas, initiatives, and people
IndustriesSection.mobileAppsDigitalProductsDesc: Audience-first strategies, designed to grow subscribers and optimise engagement
IndustriesSection.b2bServicesMarketingTechDesc: Local and regional campaigns designed to connect businesses with real clients
IndustriesSection.businessServicesDesc: Lead systems for service-based businesses to capture demand and drive consistent conversions
IndustriesSection.ecommerceDtcBrandsDesc: Ads and content designed to move product and build loyalty

list.item1: Zoom call for initial diagnosis (up to 45 min)
list.item2: Analysis of previous campaigns, funnel, website, analytics
list.item3: Study of competitors and the market (manually + through AI analytics)
list.item4: Collection of technical brief and business goals

list.item2: Building a Growth Map (what to test, what hypotheses, what stages)
list.item3: Defining KPIs: CPL, ROAS, CAC, LTV

list.item1: Producing ad creatives (UGC, static, video, AI)
list.item2: Setting up campaigns (Meta, Google, TikTok, etc.)
list.item3: Configuring event tracking via GTM and GA4
list.item4: Creating a test lead form or landing page
list.item5: Setting up a client dashboard (Looker Studio or Google Sheets)

list.item1: A/B testing of creatives, audiences, and offers
list.item2: Optimizing based on key metrics: CPC, CTR, CPL, ROAS
list.item3: Updating creatives, forms, or pages based on data

list.item1: Expanding into new channels (TikTok, YouTube, SEO, Email)
list.item3: Building LTV and automation systems (Email, CRM, analytics)

list.item1: Strategic calls held 1–2 times per month
list.item3: Proactive recommendations for new growth areas
list.item4: Optional add-on services: SEO, email, content, video, CRO

AboutTheFounderSection.name: Pushenko Eugen

about.part3: but spent 15 years in Aviation and Tourism, where marketing was always present but never the core
about.part4: By 2019, I had seen how disconnected and reactive marketing had become.
about.part5: I started building what would later become Integrity
about.part6: — not an agency in the traditional sense, but a system.
about.part7: Focused, structured, and built around what actually helps businesses grow
